query.sql: select buildingtext_dropoff as wkt, AVG(passenger_count) as w from global_temp.nyc_taxi where (buildingtext_dropoff != '' AND ST_Within(buildingtext_dropoff,'POLYGON ((-73.998427 40.730309, -73.954348 40.730309, -73.954348 40.780816 ,-73.998427 40.780816, -73.998427 40.730309))')) GROUP BY wkt
